FuncDef:
The warning-exhaust command enables the address exhaustion alarm function for an address pool or address pool group.
The undo warning-exhaust command disables the address exhaustion alarm function for an address pool or address pool group.
By default, the address exhaustion alarm function is disabled for an address pool or address pool group.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After the warning-exhaust command is executed, the system generates an address exhaustion alarm when IP addresses in an address pool or address pool group are exhausted, prompting the administrator to plan the IP addresses. When IP addresses in the address pool or address pool group are exhausted, users cannot go online.
When IP address usage of the address pool or address pool group falls below 90%, the address exhaustion alarm is cleared.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
